notes.title: Funding
notes.p: We thank Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científco e Tecnológico (CNPq), Ministério da Saúde (MS), Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (CAPES), Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do estado de Minas Gerais (FAPEMIG), and Pro-Reitoria de Pesquisa of UFMG (PRPq-UFMG). J.S.A. and L.C. are CNPq researchers. E.R. and M.L. received fellowships from CAPES-PROEX. G.S. received fellowships from FAPEMIG and V.Q. received fellowships from CNPq (PIBIC). This study was financed in part by the CAPES (Finance Code 001).
